pages.text: $(item)Aphrodium$() smells sweet like honey, and feels like the softest silk. $(br)One can feel the blood running faster only by looking at it.$(br2)And maybe, just maybe, the dreams near such a flower are as $(marked)sweet$() as its nectar.

Aphrodium is created by eating a $(l:vitalis/entry_seed)Dormant Seed$() under the greatest influence of ecstasy, ideally reached by consuming $(item)Redmost Wine$().$(br2)And this is a feast dedicated to a flower, right?
